/usr/local/bin/mpicxx  -g -DDEBUG_CUDA  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/pipeliner.dir/pipeliner.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/relion_pipeliner -Wl,-rpath,/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/cmake-build-debug/lib:/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/external/fftw/lib:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:/usr/local/lib:/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/external/fltk/lib: ../../lib/librelion_lib.so ../../../external/fftw/lib/libfftw3.so /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcufft.so /usr/local/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so -ldl ../../lib/librelion_gpu_util.so ../../../external/fltk/lib/libfltk.so /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -lrt -ldl
